decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be completed before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and condition 5 of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 as amended. | The building permitted to be used as a dwellinghouse by virtue of Class MA shall remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of Schedule 1 to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) and condition 6 of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 as amended. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s):

23-048-E01:Existing OS Plan; 23-048-E02:Existing Ground Floor Plan; 23-048-E03:Existing Basement Floor Plan; 23-048-E04:Existing First Floor Plan; 23-048-E05:Existing Second Floor Plan; 23-048-E06: Existing Third Floor Plan; 23-048-E07:Existing Roof Floor Plan; 23-048-E08: Existing Front Elevation (North-facing); 23-048-E09:Existing Rear Elevation (South-facing); 23-048-E10:Existing Section A-A & Rear Elevation (South-facing); 23-048-E11:Existing Section B-B & Side Elevation (West-facing); 23-048-P01:Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 23-048-P02: Proposed Basement Floor Plan; 23-048-P03:Proposed First Floor Plan; 23-048-P04:Proposed Second Floor Plan; 23-048-P05:Proposed Third Floor Plan; 23-048-P06:Proposed Roof Floor Plan (As Existing); 23-048-P07:Proposed Front Elevation
(North-facing) (As Existing); 23-048-P08:Proposed Rear Elevation (South-facing) (As Existing); 23-048-P09:Proposed Section A-A
& Rear Elevation (South-facing); 23-048-P10:Proposed Section B-B & Side Elevation (West-facing)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The development hereby approved shall not be occupied until refuse and recycling storage within a secure enclosure has been provided in accordance with the designated location identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 3 and in accordance with the Local Planning Authority Standards and has been fully implemented and made available for use. These facilities shall permanently retained thereafter.

Reason: To ensure the provision of satisfactory facilities for the storage of refuse and recycling material, in accordance with policy SI 8 of the London Plan (2021). | Cycle storage for 2 bicycle spaces shall be provided within the curtilage of the development, within secure, lockable compounds in accordance with the designated locations identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 3 and all adopted standards prior to the first occupation of the building. The storage spaces shall be permanently retained thereafter.
Reason:  To provide adequate bicycle storage in accordance with policy and T5 of the London Plan (2021).

| Prior to commencement of the development, a noise assessment report shall be submitted to the Council for approval in writing, of external noise sources including transport/ industrial/ commercial/ cultural uses and their noise levels occurring at the site during most of the year, ie. measured during school and work weekdays. Details shall include the sound insulation of the building envelope including glazing specifications (laboratory tested including frames, seals, and any integral ventilators, approved in accordance with BS EN ISO 10140-2:2010) and of acoustically attenuated mechanical ventilation and cooling as necessary (with air intake from the cleanest aspect of the building and details of self-noise). Details of internal noise levels according to BS8233:2014 shall be provided, together with best practicable mitigation measures, as necessary, to achieve the criteria for external amenity spaces.

Reason: In the interests of the living conditions of the future occupiers of the site in accordance with policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies D6 and D14 of the London Plan (2021), the National Planning Policy Framework (2023) and Ealing SPG1
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Change of use from Commercial, Business and Service (Use Class E) to Dwellinghouses (Use Class C3)
description: Change of use of the first floor, second floor and third floor  (Use Class E) into 1 self-contained residential unit (Use Class C3) (Class MA, 56 Day Prior Approval Process)
